feed.title: Category: Little Nemo: The Dream Master | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Little Nemo: The Dream Master (NES, 1990)
entry.content: I have this cartridge and my son thinks the box art is cool. We played today for a little and I beat the first level... which I haven't done any of the last four or five times he's wanted to see the game. I feel like it's a pretty brutal game, because most animals (and Nemo) have no offense abilities.
